## IFileSystemWriteFileOptions.convertLineEndings property

If specified, will normalize line endings to the specified style of newline. Defaults to `NewlineKind.None`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
convertLineEndings?: NewlineKind;
```
